com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.server

Interface IndelibleFSServerConnectionRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IndelibleFSServerConnectionRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClientSessionAuthentication(SessionAuthentication sessionAuthentication)
      Adds a client session authentication to the ones the remote server is allowed to access
      void close() 
      IndelibleVersion commit() 
      IndelibleVersion commitAndSnapshot(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.io.Serializable> snapshotMetadata) 
      IndelibleFSVolumeRemote createVolume(java.util.Properties volumeProperties) 
      EntityAuthentication getClientEntityAuthentication() 
      EntityAuthentication getServerEntityAuthentication() 
      SessionAuthentication getSessionAuthentication()
      Returns the SessionAuthentication that authorizes this connection to the remote Data Mover (in general, the IndelibleFSClient handles the setup of the data movers, however if you want to forward the data descriptors, you will need to forward the session authentication)
      boolean inTransaction() 
      IndelibleFSObjectID[] listVolumes() 
      IndelibleFSVolumeRemote retrieveVolume(IndelibleFSObjectID retrieveVolumeID)

      • getSessionAuthentication

        SessionAuthentication getSessionAuthentication()
                                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the SessionAuthentication that authorizes this connection to the remote Data Mover (in general, the IndelibleFSClient handles the setup of the data movers, however if you want to forward the data descriptors, you will need to forward the session authentication)
